pages.text: A handy helper that can use items just like a player! Capable of left or right clicks, and can be mounted to contraptions.

$(l)Punch, Click, and Poke$()$(br2)A Deployer can be configured to right click or left click - use a Wrench on the hand to change it. In addition, Deployers have a filter slot directly above the 'wrist' to make them more picky about what items they'll use. This might be handy on contraptions.
